snippet: More than 230 bodies of people believed to have been killed by Islamic State militants have been found in a mass grave in eastern Syria, activists said Wednesday.
abstract: More than 230 bodies of people believed to have been killed by Islamic State militants are found in mass grave in eastern Syria.
lead_paragraph: More than 230 bodies of people believed to have been killed by Islamic State militants have been found in a mass grave in eastern Syria, activists said Wednesday.

headline.main: Syria: Mass Grave May Hold Bodies of 230 Members of Anti-ISIS Tribe
headline.print_headline: Syria: Mass Grave May Hold Bodies of 230 Members of Anti-ISIS Tribe

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
